name: Grocery App Design Template
description:
Grocery App Design Template


Tanam is a simple but premium hand-crafted mobile UI kit that comes with all of screens to setup an online food or grocery shopping application designed for iOS, iPhone and any other mobile devices.

Designed by using clean and neat appearance, using green color as a main color, it gives refreshing sensation to anyone using the apps. Every package of this grocery application template consisted of 15 pages from the walkthrough, sign-in and sign-up, home, search filter, search result, product, product details, shopping chart, shipping address, payment form, my order and tracking orders.

This cool design app is available in PSD and Figma format file that can be easily edit by using Adobe Photoshop and Figma. You can change the colors, edit text and image based on your grocery and food shopping application theme that you have in mind.

**Highlights:**

+ 15 High-quality Screens in PSD and Figma format

+ Modern and clean design

+ Using FREE Font from Google Font

+ Well Documented

+ Easy to edit and customize

**List of screens:**

+ Walkthrough 01

+ Walkthrough 02

+ Sign In

+ Sign Up

+ Home

+ Search Filter

+ Search Results

+ Product Categories

+ Products

+ Product Details

+ Shopping Cart

+ Shipping Address

+ Payment Form

+ My Orders

+ Tracking Order

**Main Files:**

+ 15 PSD and Figma screens

+ PDF Documentation
